Bill Venners wrote:
> Hi Rusty,
> 
> Am I understanding correct that the problem is you can't let other users 
> see a feed for your plog, and you're surmising that Amazon doesn't offer 
> it because of the trouble with using cookie-based auth with news 
> readers? I don't see any reason that Amazon couldn't use HTTP auth for 
> accessing private feeds while still using cookie-based auth for web 
> pages. If everyone has an Amazon username and password that they use to 
> log in via cookie auth, that same pair of credentials could be given to 
> feed readers. Is that correct?
> 

Correct. That's my hypothesis. I have no inside info on how Amazon's 
authentication system is actually implemented.
